name: Slave Zero X: Episode Enyo
summary: Episode Enyo is a six-level campaign that takes place before the events of Slave Zero X, played from the perspective of one of the game’s main antagonists. The elite assassin Enyo is armed to the teeth and on a warpath to take down her most formidable target yet: the Sovereign Khan.

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: Slave Zero X: Episode Enyo - FREE Quake Campaign~!
